100.title: Episode #1.100
100.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A girl, Vrinda, who finds out that she is the illegitimate daughter of a rich man.. on his deathbed he leaves all his property to her with the request that she join his disjointed joint family.. and how she embarks on that journey.. putting her life on hold!!!and also endangering her life as the "legitimate family" hates her.. so she goes incognito with her mother's best friend and her own best friend, Rudra.. The trysts of destiny.. with love and hate balancing each other out, Vrinda goes to set her father's last wish true.. at the cost of losing her mother... by the very people she had gone to join as a family.. what follows is the main crux of the story....
imdb.title: Sammaan Ek Adhikaar
plot: A girl who finds out that she is the illegitimate daughter of a rich man.On his deathbed he leaves all his property to her with the request that she join his disjointed joint family.::Mitu

The trysts of destiny.. with love and hate balancing each other out, Vrinda goes to set her father's last wish true.. at the cost of losing her mother... by the very people she had gone to join as a family.. what follows is the main crux of the story....::MITU
